TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed TextureWrap extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Controls how textures are wrapped; specifically, how textured are rendered with a U or V coordinate outside the 0..1 range.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype GameStack.Graphics.TextureWrap Clamp = int32(33071)

Docs.summary: The color at the edge will be repeated, "smearing" edges of the texture outwards.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype GameStack.Graphics.TextureWrap Repeat = int32(10497)

Docs.summary: The texture will repeat (x = x % 1.0); use this with tiling textures.
